task.title: Create a Folder
task.shortdesc: A folder acts like a file system folder that allows you to store objects and files. You can create any number of folders in a bucket or in a folder; and organize any number of files in a folder. Any sharing attributes apply to files rather than folders.

task.title: Create new folder
task.shortdesc: Add the details of your folder:

step.cmd: Enter a name for the folder in the Name text box.
Click the Create Folder button to create your new folder, or click the X in the corner of the window to cancel the operation.
step.stepresult: After the folder is created, the bucket view or parent folder (if present) of the folder created displays.
